NAME: CA Shailee Chaudhary
ABOUT: Experienced Assistant Manager Finance with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Cash Flow, Tax Preparation, Internal Audit, Microsoft Word, and Account Reconciliation. Strong finance professional graduated from The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India.
